name: Planet Unknown (The Planet Unknown Team)
description:
Planet Unknown is a retro 2D pixel art platformer where you are a stranded adventurer on an unexplored and dangerous alien planet. To repair your ship you must traverse the strange environment and find your missing ship pieces, fighting enemy creatures and solving puzzles with the aid of special abilities.

Planet Unknown is still in development and we would love to here your feedback! Please  fill out the following form after playing :)

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdANMrNCAYIsx8jIbb4JxEjJeJip0X_alfLTbzT...
